xuiDroppable
directive in module xui

Description

XUI component for HTML 5 drop.

Usage

as attribute
<ANY xui-droppable
     [on-drop="{function(event, transferObject) }"]
     [on-drag-over="{function(event) }"]
     [on-drag-enter="{function(event) }"]
     [on-drag-leave="{function(event) }"]
     [drag-over-class="{string}"]>
   ...
</ANY>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
onDrop
(optional)
function(event, transferObject)

Event called when object is dropped. May return a promise.

onDragOver
(optional)
function(event)

Event called during drag over.

onDragEnter
(optional)
function(event)

Event called when mouse enters during drag.

onDragLeave
(optional)
function(event)

Event called when mouse leaves during drag.

dragOverClass
(optional)
string

CSS class to be added to droppable target when acceptable item is about to be dropped on it.

Example
